settings.welcome_page_content: We want you to be passionate about your purchase. If youâ€™re not feeling the love, return your shoesandsox.com.au product(s) within 30 days from the date of delivery free of charge for a full refund (less any shipping costs paid).
settings.welcome_page_condition_points:
We have 3 conditions for returns due to a change of mind:

1. Items must be returned within 28 days of the order date;

2. Items must be unworn with the original tags still attached - we are unable to accept returns with dirty marks or wear marks;

3. Items must be purchased directly from our website.

You can find our full returns policy here.
